languages.text: {n}Вокс щелкает, впуская кого-то в канал.{/n} "Огиры, {name}. Так называют эту древнюю рухлядь в наших легендах — согласно им, эти ходячие мертвецы существовали еще до нашего появления. Впрочем, для простых легенд эти твари слишком материальны, как и их колыбели в этой части галактики: разведчики Опустошительной бури давно докладывали о встречах с ними в реальном мире. Вот то, что огиры пробудились от своих снов и нападают на всех подвернувшихся под руку — это дурной знак".

{n}The vox clicks as it lets someone into the channel.{/n} "The Oghyr, {name}. That is what our legends call those decrepit relics, those walking corpses that supposedly existed even before our time. However, they are far too real to be dismissed as mere legend, and so are their cradles in this part of the galaxy. Reaving Tempest scouts have long been reporting encounters with them in realspace. And it bodes no good that the Oghyr have awakened from their sleep and are attacking anything in sight."
languages.original_text: {n}Вокс щелкает, впуская кого-то в канал.{/n} "Огиры, {name}. Так называют эту древнюю рухлядь в наших легендах — согласно им, эти ходячие мертвецы существовали еще до нашего появления. Впрочем, для простых легенд эти твари слишком материальны, как и их колыбели в этой части галактики: разведчики Опустошительной бури давно докладывали о встречах с ними в реальном мире. Вот то, что огиры пробудились от своих снов и нападают на всех подвернувшихся под руку — это дурной знак".

traits.locale_text: {n}The vox clicks as it lets someone into the channel.{/n} "The Oghyr, {name}. That's what our legends call this ancient junk. According to them, those walking corpses had been around before we existed. That said, there's too much material reality to those monstrosities for them to be simple legends. The same goes for their lairs in this part of the galaxy. Reaving Tempest scouts have long been reporting encounters with them in realspace. And it bodes no good that the Oghyr have awakened from their sleep and are attacking whoever they see."

{n}The vox clicks as it lets someone into the channel.{/n} "The Oghyr, {name}. That's what our legends call this ancient junk. According to them, those walking corpses had been around before we existed. That said, there's too much material reality to those monstrosities for them to be simple legends. The same goes for their lairs in this part of the galaxy. Reaving Tempest scouts have long been reporting encounters with them in realspace. And it bodes no good that the Oghyr have awakened from their sleep and are attacking whoever they see."

{n}The vox clicks as it lets someone into the channel.{/n} "The Oghyr, {name}. That's what our legends call this ancient junk. According to them, those walking corpses had been around long before our time. That said, these monstrosities are very much real and exist well outside the folklore; same goes for their lairs in this part of the galaxy. Reaving Tempest scouts have long been reporting encounters with them in realspace. And it bodes no good that the Oghyr have awakened from their sleep and are attacking anything they get their hands on."

{n}The vox clicks as it lets someone into the channel.{/n} "The Oghyr, {name}. That's what our legends call this ancient junk. According to them, those walking corpses had been around long before our time. That said, these monstrosities are very much real and exist well outside the folklore; same goes for their lairs in this part of the galaxy. Reaving Tempest scouts have long been reporting encounters with them in realspace. And it bodes no good that the Oghyr have awakened from their sleep and are attacking anything they get their hands on."

{n}The vox clicks as it lets someone into the channel.{/n} "The Oghyr, {name}. That is what our legends call those decrepit relics, those walking corpses that supposedly existed even before our time. However, they are far too real to be dismissed as mere legend, and so are their cradles in this part of the galaxy. Reaving Tempest scouts have long been reporting encounters with them in realspace. And it bodes no good that the Oghyr have awakened from their sleep and are attacking anything in sight."

languages.text: {n}音阵装置发出了咔哒声，另一个人加入了频道。{/n}“他们是遗落者，{name}。在我们的传说之中，我们就是这么称呼那些古老的破烂。那些会动的死人早在我们的时代之前就已经存在了，这些铁疙瘩都是真实存在的，不仅仅是什么传说故事，他们在这片区域的摇篮也是货真价实的东西。狂风阴谋团的侦察兵很久以前就报告过，说总会在真实世界遇到他们。那些遗落者从睡梦中醒了过来，见谁杀谁，这可不是什么好兆头。”
languages.original_text: {n}The vox clicks as it lets someone into the channel.{/n} "The Oghyr, {name}. That is what our legends call those decrepit relics, those walking corpses that supposedly existed even before our time. However, they are far too real to be dismissed as mere legend, and so are their cradles in this part of the galaxy. Reaving Tempest scouts have long been reporting encounters with them in realspace. And it bodes no good that the Oghyr have awakened from their sleep and are attacking anything in sight."

traits.locale_text: {n}音阵装置发出了咔哒声，另一个人加入了频道。{/n}“他们是遗落者，{name}。在我们的传说之中，我们就是这么称呼那些古老的破烂。那些会动的死人早在我们的时代之前就已经存在了，这些铁疙瘩都是真实存在的，不仅仅是什么传说故事，他们在这片区域的摇篮也是货真价实的东西。狂风阴谋团的侦察兵很久以前就报告过，说总会在真实世界遇到他们。那些遗落者从睡梦中醒了过来，见谁杀谁，这可不是什么好兆头。”

languages.text: {n}Le vox émet un clic au moment où quelqu'un rejoint le canal.{/n} « Les Oghyrs, {name}. C'est comme ça que nos légendes appellent ces fossiles décrépits, ces cadavres ambulants qui auraient prétendument vu le jour bien avant notre ère. Pour autant, ils sont bien réels, trop pour être relégués au rang de simple mythe, et il en va de même pour leurs repaires dans cette partie de la galaxie. Les éclaireurs de la Tempête ravageuse font état de rencontres avec eux dans l'espace réel depuis longtemps. Et le fait que les Oghyrs soient sortis de leur sommeil et attaquent tout ce qui croise leur chemin n'est pas de bon augure. »
languages.original_text: {n}The vox clicks as it lets someone into the channel.{/n} "The Oghyr, {name}. That is what our legends call those decrepit relics, those walking corpses that supposedly existed even before our time. However, they are far too real to be dismissed as mere legend, and so are their cradles in this part of the galaxy. Reaving Tempest scouts have long been reporting encounters with them in realspace. And it bodes no good that the Oghyr have awakened from their sleep and are attacking anything in sight."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vox émet un clic au moment où quelqu'un rejoint le canal.{/n} « Les Oghyrs, {name}. C'est comme ça que nos légendes appellent ces fossiles décrépits, ces cadavres ambulants qui auraient prétendument vu le jour bien avant notre ère. Pour autant, ils sont bien réels, trop pour être relégués au rang de simple mythe, et il en va de même pour leurs repaires dans cette partie de la galaxie. Les éclaireurs de la Tempête ravageuse font état de rencontres avec eux dans l'espace réel depuis longtemps. Et le fait que les Oghyrs soient sortis de leur sommeil et attaquent tout ce qui croise leur chemin n'est pas de bon augure. »

languages.text: {n}Das Vox klickt, als es jemanden auf den Kanal lässt.{/n} "Die Oghyr, {name}. So wird dieser alte Schrott in unseren Legenden bezeichnet. Es heißt, dass diese wandelnden Leichen schon lange vor unserer Zeit existierten. Aber diese Monstrositäten sind sehr real und existieren auch außerhalb der Folklore – das Gleiche gilt für ihre Verstecke in diesem Teil der Galaxie. Die Späher des plündernden Sturms haben schon oft berichtet, dass sie ihnen im Realraum begegnet sind. Und es lässt Böses ahnen, dass die Oghyr aus ihrem Schlaf erwacht sind und alles angreifen, was ihnen in die Hände fällt."
languages.original_text: {n}The vox clicks as it lets someone into the channel.{/n} "The Oghyr, {name}. That's what our legends call this ancient junk. According to them, those walking corpses had been around long before our time. That said, these monstrosities are very much real and exist well outside the folklore; same goes for their lairs in this part of the galaxy. Reaving Tempest scouts have long been reporting encounters with them in realspace. And it bodes no good that the Oghyr have awakened from their sleep and are attacking anything they get their hands on."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Vox klickt, als es jemanden auf den Kanal lässt.{/n} "Die Oghyr, {name}. So wird dieser alte Schrott in unseren Legenden bezeichnet. Es heißt, dass diese wandelnden Leichen schon lange vor unserer Zeit existierten. Aber diese Monstrositäten sind sehr real und existieren auch außerhalb der Folklore – das Gleiche gilt für ihre Verstecke in diesem Teil der Galaxie. Die Späher des plündernden Sturms haben schon oft berichtet, dass sie ihnen im Realraum begegnet sind. Und es lässt Böses ahnen, dass die Oghyr aus ihrem Schlaf erwacht sind und alles angreifen, was ihnen in die Hände fällt."

languages.text: {n}El voco chasquea al entrar alguien en el canal.{/n} «Los Oghyr, {name}. Ese es el nombre que nuestras leyendas dan a esas reliquias vetustas. Según dicen, esos cadáveres andantes son anteriores incluso a nosotros. Sin embargo, que figuren en nuestras leyendas no implica en absoluto que sean ficticios; son tan reales como los santuarios que tienen en esta parte de la galaxia. Los exploradores de la Tempestad Asoladora llevan ya tiempo informando de avistamientos de estas criaturas en el espacio real. Y puedo decir sin miedo a equivocarme que el hecho de que los Oghyr hayan despertado de su letargo y estén atacando a cualquier cosa que se encuentren no augura nada bueno».
languages.original_text: {n}The vox clicks as it lets someone into the channel.{/n} "The Oghyr, {name}. That is what our legends call those decrepit relics, those walking corpses that supposedly existed even before our time. However, they are far too real to be dismissed as mere legend, and so are their cradles in this part of the galaxy. Reaving Tempest scouts have long been reporting encounters with them in realspace. And it bodes no good that the Oghyr have awakened from their sleep and are attacking anything in sight."

traits.locale_text: {n}El voco chasquea al entrar alguien en el canal.{/n} «Los Oghyr, {name}. Ese es el nombre que nuestras leyendas dan a esas reliquias vetustas. Según dicen, esos cadáveres andantes son anteriores incluso a nosotros. Sin embargo, que figuren en nuestras leyendas no implica en absoluto que sean ficticios; son tan reales como los santuarios que tienen en esta parte de la galaxia. Los exploradores de la Tempestad Asoladora llevan ya tiempo informando de avistamientos de estas criaturas en el espacio real. Y puedo decir sin miedo a equivocarme que el hecho de que los Oghyr hayan despertado de su letargo y estén atacando a cualquier cosa que se encuentren no augura nada bueno».

languages.text: {n}誰かがチャンネルに入り、ヴォクスがカチっと鳴る。{/n}「オグハイル、{name}我々の伝説では、この古代のガラクタをそう呼んでいる。彼らによれば、歩く死体は我々の時代よりずっと前から存在していた。とはいえ、この怪物は実在し、民間伝承の域を超えている。銀河系のこの地域にある彼らの隠れ家も同様だ。リーヴィング・テンペストの斥候は、長い間、リアルスペースでの彼らとの遭遇を報告してきた。オグハイルが眠りから覚め、手あたり次第何でも攻撃しているのは、良い兆候ではない」
languages.original_text: {n}The vox clicks as it lets someone into the channel.{/n} "The Oghyr, {name}. That is what our legends call those decrepit relics, those walking corpses that supposedly existed even before our time. However, they are far too real to be dismissed as mere legend, and so are their cradles in this part of the galaxy. Reaving Tempest scouts have long been reporting encounters with them in realspace. And it bodes no good that the Oghyr have awakened from their sleep and are attacking anything in sight."

traits.locale_text: {n}誰かがチャンネルに入り、ヴォクスがカチっと鳴る。{/n}「オグハイル、{name}我々の伝説では、この古代のガラクタをそう呼んでいる。彼らによれば、歩く死体は我々の時代よりずっと前から存在していた。とはいえ、この怪物は実在し、民間伝承の域を超えている。銀河系のこの地域にある彼らの隠れ家も同様だ。リーヴィング・テンペストの斥候は、長い間、リアルスペースでの彼らとの遭遇を報告してきた。オグハイルが眠りから覚め、手あたり次第何でも攻撃しているのは、良い兆候ではない」

languages.text: {n}Kanala birinin katılmasıyla vokstan bir tıkırtı geliyor.{/n} "Oghyr. Bizim destanlarda o kadim varlıklara böyle derler. Bizden bile önce yaşamış bu yürüyen cesetler. Fakat destan deyip geçmemek lazım, bu anlatıların gerçeklik payı hayli fazla. Galaksinin bu tarafındaki yuvaları da efsaneden ibaret değil. Müfteris Kasırga'nın keşif erleri, gerçekuzayda onlarla defalarca karşılaştıklarını bildirmişlerdi. Oghyrlerin uykularından uyanmış ve gördükleri her şeye saldırıyor olmaları hiç hayra alamet değil."
languages.original_text: {n}The vox clicks as it lets someone into the channel.{/n} "The Oghyr, {name}. That is what our legends call those decrepit relics, those walking corpses that supposedly existed even before our time. However, they are far too real to be dismissed as mere legend, and so are their cradles in this part of the galaxy. Reaving Tempest scouts have long been reporting encounters with them in realspace. And it bodes no good that the Oghyr have awakened from their sleep and are attacking anything in sight."
